overview: Missy is tired of John always playing video games. She convinces him that scoring with her is better than scoring on the TV screen. Chris the mechanic fixed Ally's car, but what she wasn't expecting was the price of the repair. Eden has a big crush on a dreamy basketball player named Chris. She decides to play a little game of horse and whoever wins gets to fuck her. Mindy orders pizza from Jack but realizes she doesn't have cash, only credit cards. Like all teen girls Misty wants a cute little tattoo. She goes down to Joey's tattoo studio only to get scared of the needle. Joey comforts her with his own fleshy needle.
title: Too Big for Teens 2
